title: Tim Participated in a Free Webinar About Marketing

config: Yes! On January 28th, Tim Stanley, our CEO, participated in the free webinar "Smart Branding and Promotion of Your Law Firm in the Digital Age â€“ It Should Not Cost You a Fortune, But It Could Make You One!" The webinar was intended for plaintiff and criminal defense attorneys and paralegals. It covered different topics from Grass Root Marketing, GMB, SEO, Reputation Management, to Ethical Promotion of the Practice.
